feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
